SELECT a.* ,b.name as "fieldName" ,b.value as "fieldValue" ,c.name as "queryName" ,d.name as "inputName" ,e.name as "verifyName" FROM s_database_content a left join s_dict b on b.id = a.field_type left join s_dict c on c.id = a.query_type left join s_dict d on d.id = a.input_type left join s_dict e on e.id = a.verify_type where 1=1
ORDER BY a.id
